org.codehaus.preon
Interface CodecSelector

public interface CodecSelector

The interface to be implemented by objects that have the capability to select a Codec based on data on the buffer and a context for resolving references.

Author:
Wilfred Springer

Method Summary
 void document(nl.flotsam.pecia.ParaContents<?> para)
          Documents the procedure for deciding among a couple of Codecs.
 Collection<Codec<?>> getChoices()
          Returns the collection of all choices this selector will have to choose from.
 Expression<Integer,Resolver> getSize()
          Returns an expression representing the number of bits inhabited by the actual selecting bit.
 Codec<?> select(BitBuffer buffer, Resolver resolver)
          Selects the Codec to be used for decoding, based on the bits on the BitBuffer and the references that can be resolved using the resolver.
<T> Codec<?>
select(Class<T> type, BitChannel channel, Resolver resolver)
           
 

Method Detail

select

Codec<?> select(BitBuffer buffer,
                Resolver resolver)
                throws DecodingException
Selects the Codec to be used for decoding, based on the bits on the BitBuffer and the references that can be resolved using the resolver.

Parameters:
buffer - The buffer providing the bits.
resolver - The resolver for resolving references.
Returns:
The Codec that needs to be used.
Throws:
DecodingException - If we fail to select a Codec for the data found in the BitBuffer.

select

<T> Codec<?> select(Class<T> type,
                    BitChannel channel,
                    Resolver resolver)
                throws IOException
Throws:
IOException

getChoices

Collection<Codec<?>> getChoices()
Returns the collection of all choices this selector will have to choose from.

Returns:
The Collection of all choices this selector will have to choose from.

document

void document(nl.flotsam.pecia.ParaContents<?> para)
Documents the procedure for deciding among a couple of Codecs.

Parameters:
para - The context for generating the content.

getSize

Expression<Integer,Resolver> getSize()
Returns an expression representing the number of bits inhabited by the actual selecting bit.
